text: Francisco, El Jesuita is a 2015 American four-part television miniseries directed by Matthias Gueilburt and produced by Anima Films. His first episode debuted on Telemundo on September 13, 2015. == Awards == {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#b0c4de; text-align:center;" ! Year ! Award ! Category !
